comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Douglas AD-6 Skyraider 137604 pictured making an unassisted take off from a carrier. Aircafrt belonged to VA-215 Modex 506 on engine cowl and tail code G of Carrier Air Group Twenty One (CVG-21) Possibly aboard CVA-31 USS Bon Homme Richard. In Light Gull Gray and Insignia White scheme as applied to US Navy aircraft after 1955. ‘GO!NAVY’ CVG-21 deployment record: www.gonavy.jp/CVG-CVG21-3f.html VA-215 deployment record: www.gonavy.jp/navy/sqn/VA215a.html (above info courtesy Takafumi Hiroe, citizen of Japan and naval aviation historian) Unfortunately there are as yet no other known internet accessible references to AD-6 /A-1H 137604 allowing any further research.
